Introduction

SPEED (Korean: 스피드; Japanese: スピード) was a seven-member Kpop group under MBK Entertainment. They debuted on January 15, 2013, and disbanded in November of 2015. The band started as the male sub-unit of Co-ed School until they became an independent group in 2013 with their sister group F-ve Dolls.

The group consisted of Yuhwan, Jungwoo, Taeha, Jongkook, Sejun, KI-O, and Sungmin. Before disbandment, the former members were Kwanghaeng, Taewoon, and Noori.
